title: Mystery gift GONE
body:
When I opened my client I reciviced a mystery skin, I pressed Awesome and then I just returned to the client. I did not get anything.
I looked through all my owned champions, not a new one, all the skins, still not a new and the purchase history... Nothing. So if anyone knows the solution or what happened please help.

replies.body:
Hey there,

More than likely the "Mystery Skin" you received was simply the notification of the summoner icon that was given out, check out your icons for one that looks like mine :)
